import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import pie from '../IMAGES/pie.png'; export default function AboutUs() { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); return (
{t('About Us')}
{t('Mission')}
{t('missionStatement')}
{t('Drive')}
{t('driveStatement1')}
{t('driveStatement2')}
{t('driveStatement3')}
); }
